author: sorcer1163
content: Miners don't have cheaper transactions than anyone else. The block space is finite. If I include one of my own TXs in my own block for $0, then I lose out on revenue for another transaction I could have included.

author: sorcer1163
content: Now why some mining pools chose to pay out all the time, giving up revenue just to stuff state with micropayments annoys me

author: sorcer1163
content: Because it both leads to less revenue for the miner, and state bloat.
